{{cpp/ranges/iota_view/title|empty}}
{{cpp/ranges/iota_view/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++20|
constexpr bool empty() const;
}}

Checks whether the range is empty (i.e. whether the beginning value is the same as the sentinel value).

===Return value===
{{box|{{rlpsi|/#value_}}{{nbspt}}{{c/core|1===}}{{nbspt}}{{rlpsi|/#bound_}}}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cassert&gt;
#include &lt;ranges&gt;

int main()
{
    auto a = std::ranges::iota_view&lt;int, int&gt;();
    assert(a.empty());
    
    auto b = std::ranges::iota_view(4);
    assert(!b.empty());
    
    auto c = std::ranges::iota_view(4, 8);
    assert(!c.empty());
}
}}
